review_data.title: Good Chinese at fair price for Switzerland

review_data.title: Decent Chinese Food in Zurich Old Town
review_data.content: Zurich was our last stop before flying back to Asia and after 2 weeks of European food, this was a welcome change. We ordered fired rice, vegetables & tofu for lunch. The quality was OK and the portion was quite big.

review_data.title: good asian food

review_data.title: Yummy

review_data.title: Extremely terrible !!!
review_data.content: Totally rubbish !!! DO NOT GO THERE !!! The worst restaurant ever. Awful food and tiny dishes， very expensive. It is not Chinese cuisine, it is feed！It is not making money, it's Rob! Shame for it. 用tripadvisor那么久，第一次评论。因为穷游网的推荐而找到这家餐厅。 菜不是现炒的， 是加热的冷菜，分量很小，跟国内餐前的花生米似的。油鸡就像是自助餐店剩菜回收的，底下垫着一层半生不熟的黄豆芽，敢问这是哪门子奇葩组合？ 咖喱牛肉里面竟然放大白菜，肉老味寡，感觉老板连咖喱都舍不得放！ 就这样两个菜加一瓶水一瓶可乐竟然64块瑞郎！！彻底被坑，不来评论一下就是对其他消费者的不负责，这种黑店就该在人民群众的批斗下倒闭！！我吃过最难吃的中餐，没有之一，负分滚粗！
